code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"../styling/matchPage.css";import{useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import MatchDetailComponent from"../components/matchDetailComponent";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Match(){const{team1,team2}=useParams();const[match,setMatch]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchMatch=async()=>{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8081/dashboard/matchBetween/".concat(team1,"/").concat(team2));const data=await response.json();setMatch(data);};fetchMatch();},[team1,team2]);if(!match||!match[0]){return"Data Not Fetched";}let wonT1=0;match.map(m=>wonT1=team1===m.winningTeam?wonT1+1:wonT1);let wonT2=match.length-wonT1;const wonTeam=wonT1>wonT2?team1:team2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"matchPage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"diffLinkCol",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/team/".concat(team1),children:[team1," "]}),"VS",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/team/".concat(team2),children:[" ",team2]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:wonT1>wonT2?"won-card":"lost-card",children:[team1," won ",wonT1," matches."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:wonT1<wonT2?"won-card":"lost-card",children:[team2," won ",wonT2," matches."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Total Matches: ",match.length]}),match.map(m=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MatchDetailComponent,{teamName:wonTeam,match:m,show:true}))]});}export default Match;
